00054 const std::string TRANSLATION_OPT_GENO_DMET2_FILE = \
00055     "(DMET2: 1 of 2 experiment files) => YYYYMMDD_*_DMET[23]_Genotypes*.txt";
00056 const std::string EXCEPTION_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE
00057 = "Invalid option: translation file is required (i.e. -t, --translate-file option).";
00058 
00059 const std::string EXCEPTION_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP_FILE
00060 = "Invalid option: experiment CHP files is required (i.e. -e, --experiment-list option).";
00061 
00062 const std::string HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_FIRST = "Reporting only first named haplotype among non-differentiable haplotype names in translation file.";
00063 
00064 const std::string HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_DUPLICATE =  "Reporting a combined haplotype name based on all non-differentiable haplotype names in translation file.";

00067 /*****************************************************************************/
00068 /**
00069  * TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions
00070  * Synopsis:
00071  *
00072  *  Define the space of possible PgOptions for command line or console. 
00073  *  
00074  *
00075  * @param opts - newly allocated PgOptions from either console or command line.
00076  *
00077  */
00078 /*****************************************************************************/
00079 void TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions(TranslationEngine *engine)
00080 {
00081 
00082 
00083   APT_ERR_ASSERT(engine, "");
00084 
00085   // Program Control
00086   engine->defineOptionSection("Program Control");
00087   engine->defineOption("", "dmet2-calling", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00088                      "=> use DMET2 logic for making allele calls." , "false");
00089   engine->defineOption("", "enforce-complete-haplotypes", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00090                      "=> Enforce that experiment data has a complete set of markers for any haplotype set and abort when incomplete haplotype sets are detected." , "false");
00091   engine->defineOption("", "ignore-unknown-alleles", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00092                      "=> Ignore unknown alleles for a multi-allelic marker where the allele is not specified in the translation file. " , "false");
00093   engine->defineOption("", "ignore-report-allele", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00094                      "=> Use the alleles from the translation file for reporting and not the report allele in the annotation file. ", "false");
00095 
00096   engine->defineOption("", "audit", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00097                      "=> Audit various components of translation, don't translate.\nAvailable audit types are:\n * annotation - audit annotation file probe sets against the translation file.", "");
00098 
00099   engine->defineOption("", "use-first-dup-allele-def", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00100                      "=> If marker list filtering removes markers needed to differntiate among multiple possible haplotypes then report only the first named haplotype in the Translation file.", "false");
00101 
00102 
00103   // Input Section
00104   engine->defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00105 
00106   engine->defineOption("a", "annotation-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00107                      "=> file.csv (probe set annotation file, CSV)", "");
00108 
00109   engine->defineOption("c", "copy-dmet2-number-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00110                      "(DMET2: 2 of 2 experiment files) => YYYYMMDD_*_DMET[23]_cn_*.txt", "");
00111   engine->defineOption("e", "experiment-list", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00112                      "=> file1.chp;file2.chp;... OR file1.chp:file2.chp:..", "");
00113   engine->defineOption("E", "experiment-list-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00114                      "=> file with listing of CHP files. (Commented out lines starting with '#' are allowed).", "");
00115   engine->defineOption("g", "geno-dmet2-type-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00116                      TRANSLATION_OPT_GENO_DMET2_FILE, "");
00117   engine->defineOption("i", "input-dir", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00118                      "=> Directory to read input files from when file is not specified (-c, -g, -t_). The current directory is assumed when not specified." , "");
00119   engine->defineOption("m", "marker-list-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00120                      "=> marker-list-file.*.txt file is a simple list of probe sets, one per line, to be used for translation.", "");
00121   engine->defineOption("n", "genotype-override-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00122                      "=> file with genotype override base calls in TSV format." , "");
00123 
00124   engine->defineOption("s", "sample-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00125                      "=> file.txt (sample info file, TSV)" , "");
00126 
00127 
00128   engine->defineOption("t", "translate-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00129                      "=> DMET3_TTTable_vYYYYMMDD_*.txt (DMET2_TTTable_vYYYYMMDD_*.txt for DMET2 testing)", "");
00130 
00131   engine->defineOption("", "metabolizer-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00132                                          "The metabolizer bin file for translating allele calls to metabolizer genotypes", "");
00133   
00134   // Output Section
00135   engine->defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00136   engine->defineOption("b", "base-name-prefix", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00137                      "=> Base name prefix of all output reports.", "");
00138 
00139   // Reporting Section
00140   engine->defineOptionSection("Reporting Options");
00141   engine->defineOption("p", "profile", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00142                      " => Profile reporting.", "false");
00143 
00144   engine->defineOption("r", "regression", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00145                      " => Regression log level.", "0");
00146 
00147   engine->defineOption("", "marker-report", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00148                      " => Output DMET2 Marker Report.", "false");
00149 
00150   engine->defineOption("", "summary-report-sort", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00151                      "=> Sort the summary report rather than use the default translation table order.", "true");
00152 
00153   engine->defineOption("u", "uncalled-report-all-markers", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00154                      "=> Report all markers in the uncalled report, not just the uncalled markers.","false");
00155   
00156 
00157   return;
00158 
00159 }
00160 // end TranslationCommonControl::defineCommonOptions
00161 /*****************************************************************************/
00162 /*****************************************************************************/
00163 /**
00164  * Synopsis: Convert the Copy Number Report, Genotype Short Report
00165  * and Translation Tablem input files into in memory models.
00166  * Note that all the input paramaters are for return. 
00167  *
00168  * 
00169  * @param rte         - single instance run-time environment data model
00170  * @param returnMlm   - marker list single instance data model 
00171  * @param returnCnrm  - DMET2 only copy number list single instance data model
00172  * @param returnGtm   - Genotype data (CHP) single instance data model. 
00173  * @param returnTtm   - Translation table data single instance data mode.
00174  * @param returnSitm  - Sample info single instance data model.
00175  * @param returnGotm  - Genotype override single instance data model. 
00176  * 
00177  * @return true - all models where successfully allocated on the heap. 
00178  * 
00179  */
00180 /*****************************************************************************/
00181 bool TranslationCommonControl::initializeInputFileModels(RunTimeEnvironment &rte,
00182     MarkerListModel             **returnMlm,
00183     CopyNumberTableModel        **returnCnrm,
00184     GenotypeTableModel          **returnGtm,
00185     TranslationTableModel       **returnTtm,
00186     SampleInfoTableModel        **returnSitm,
00187     GenotypeOverrideTableModel  **returnGotm)
00188 {
00189 
00190   std::stringstream msgSStr;
00191   APT_ERR_ASSERT(returnCnrm && returnGtm && returnTtm, "");
00192 
00193   bool okToContinue = true;
00194 
00195   APT_ERR_ASSERT(!*returnCnrm && !*returnGtm && !*returnTtm && !*returnMlm, "");
00196 
00197 
00198   // TRANSLATION TABLE
00199   *returnTtm = new TranslationTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType);
00200   msgSStr <<  "Input translation file records read:      " << (*returnTtm)->size() ;
00201 
00202   Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00203   msgSStr.str("");
00204 
00205 
00206   // COPY NUMBER, DMET2 ONLY
00207   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling) {
00208     *returnCnrm = new CopyNumberTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputCopyFile);
00209     msgSStr <<  "Input copy number records read:     " << (*returnCnrm)->size();
00210     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00211   } else {
00212     *returnCnrm = new CopyNumberTableModel();
00213   }
00214 
00215   msgSStr.str("");
00216 
00217   // MARKER LIST
00218   // Translation Table Filter.
00219   // Modify the Translation Table and filter the appropriate probe sets
00220   // and to merge the allele names for shared haplotype calls.
00221   if (*returnTtm && (! rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.empty())) {
00222     *returnMlm = new MarkerListModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile);
00223   } else if (*returnTtm && (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputProbeSetVector.size() > 0)) {
00224     *returnMlm = new MarkerListModel(rte);
00225   }
00226   
00227   if (*returnMlm) {
00228     msgSStr << "Input marker list, probe set records read: "  << (*returnMlm)->size();
00229     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00230 
00231     okToContinue = okToContinue && (*returnTtm)->probeSetFilter(rte, **returnMlm);
00232     (*returnMlm)->describeVerbose(rte);
00233   }
00234 
00235   // TRANSLATION TABLE GENE MARKER INDEX
00236   // Generate the complete list of gene markers for those operations
00237   // that require gene marker sets.
00238   // Must be done after the MARKER LIST has filtered the translation table.
00239   if ( *returnTtm ) {
00240     (*returnTtm)->generateGeneMarkerList();
00241   }
00242 
00243   msgSStr.str("");
00244 
00245   // GENOTYPE OVERRIDE FILE
00246   if (returnGotm && (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile.empty())) {
00247 
00248     *returnGotm = new GenotypeOverrideTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile, **returnTtm);
00249     msgSStr << "Input genotype override records read:      " << (*returnGotm)->size();
00250     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00251   }
00252 
00253   msgSStr.str("");
00254 
00255   // GENOTYPE
00256   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType == ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_TSV) {
00257     *returnGtm = new GenotypeTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile, returnGotm ? *returnGotm : NULL);
00258   } else {
00259     *returnGtm = new GenotypeTableModel(rte, returnGotm ? *returnGotm : NULL);
00260   }
00261 
00262   // SAMPLE INFO FILE
00263   if (returnSitm && (! rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile.empty())) {
00264 
00265     *returnSitm = new SampleInfoTableModel(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile);
00266     msgSStr << "Input sample info records read:            " << (*returnSitm)->size();
00267     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00268   } else if (returnSitm && (rte.m_adtOpts.m_sampleTable.size() != 0)) {
00269     *returnSitm = new SampleInfoTableModel(rte);
00270     msgSStr << "Input sample info records read:            " << (*returnSitm)->size();
00271     Verbose::out(rte.m_currentVerbosity, msgSStr.str());
00272   }
00273 
00274   msgSStr.str("");
00275 
00276   return okToContinue;
00277 
00278 }
00279 // end TranslationCommonControl::initializeInputFileModels
00280 /*****************************************************************************/
00281 /*****************************************************************************/
00282 /**
00283  * TranslationCommonControl::setCommonADTOptions:
00284  * Synopsis:
00285  * A quasie ADTOptions constructor. Perhaps it should be?
00286  * Copies all the passed in options to the ADTOptions single instance
00287  * object that itself is stashed in the rte. 
00288  *
00289  *
00290  * @param adtOpts - the ADTOptions to set up.
00291  * @param ptOpts  - from command line or console.
00292  *
00293  */
00294 /*****************************************************************************/
00295 void TranslationCommonControl::setCommonADTOptions(ADTOptions & adtOpts, class TranslationEngine *engine)
00296 {
00297   // Copy into our friendly ADTOptions class.
00298   adtOpts.m_progName        = engine->getProgName();
00299   int i                      = adtOpts.m_progName.rfind("/") ;
00300   adtOpts.m_progName        = adtOpts.m_progName.substr(i ? i + 1 : 0);
00301 
00302   adtOpts.m_inputDir        = engine->getOpt("input-dir");
00303 
00304   adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling    = engine->getOptBool("dmet2-calling");
00305   adtOpts.m_enforceCompleteHaplotypeGroup
00306   = engine->getOptBool("enforce-complete-haplotypes");
00307 
00308   adtOpts.m_ignoreReportAllele = engine->getOptBool("ignore-report-allele");
00309 
00310   adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile
00311   = engine->getOpt("annotation-file");
00312 
00313   adtOpts.m_ignoreUnknownAlleles
00314   = engine->getOptBool("ignore-unknown-alleles");
00315   adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDef
00316   = engine->getOptBool("use-first-dup-allele-def");
00317 
00318   adtOpts.m_audit            = engine->getOpt("audit");
00319 
00320   
00321   adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList
00322   = engine->getOpt("experiment-list");
00323   adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile
00324   = engine->getOpt("experiment-list-file");
00325 
00326 
00327   adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile = engine->getOpt("translate-file");
00328 
00329   adtOpts.m_inputTTableType = TranslationTableModel::getTranslationTableFileType(adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile);
00330 
00331   adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile   = engine->getOpt("geno-dmet2-type-file");
00332 
00333   adtOpts.m_inputCopyFile   = engine->getOpt("copy-dmet2-number-file");
00334 
00335   adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile  = engine->getOpt("marker-list-file");
00336 
00337   if (! adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.empty()) {
00338     if (adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDef) {
00339       adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDefHeaderText =  HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_FIRST;
00340     } else {
00341       adtOpts.m_useFirstDupAlleleDefHeaderText =  HAPLOTYPE_REPORT_OPTION_DUPLICATE;
00342     }
00343   }
00344 
00345   adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile
00346   = engine->getOpt("genotype-override-file");
00347 
00348   adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile    = engine->getOpt("sample-file");
00349 
00350   adtOpts.m_outputDir = engine->getOpt("out-dir").empty()?".":engine->getOpt("out-dir");
00351 
00352   adtOpts.m_logFile       = engine->getOpt("log-file");
00353 
00354   adtOpts.m_outputReportPrefix = engine->getOpt("base-name-prefix");
00355 
00356   adtOpts.m_verbosity = engine->getOptInt("verbose") ? engine->getOptInt("verbose") : 1;
00357 
00358   adtOpts.m_profile = engine->getOptBool("profile");
00359 
00360   adtOpts.m_regression = engine->getOptInt("regression") ? engine->getOptInt("regression") : 0;
00361 
00362   adtOpts.m_markerReport = engine->getOptBool("marker-report");
00363 
00364   adtOpts.m_summaryReportSort = engine->getOptBool("summary-report-sort");
00365 
00366   adtOpts.m_uncalledReportAllMarkers = engine->getOptBool("uncalled-report-all-markers");
00367   
00368 
00369   return;
00370 
00371 }
00372 // end TranslationCommonControl::setCommonADTOptions
00373 /*****************************************************************************/
00374 /*****************************************************************************/
00375 /**
00376  * _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3:
00377  * Synopsis:
00378  *
00379  * Helper function to _validateInputFilesDMET3, broken out for clarity.
00380  *
00381  * This routine reads a listing of files from a list passed in at the
00382  * command line, i.e. ( -e file1,file2,...,filen
00383  *
00384  *
00385  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00386  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00387  *
00388  * @return - true if all input data was valid
00389  */
00390 /*****************************************************************************/
00391 static bool _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine* engine)
00392 {
00393 
00394   bool validOptions = true;
00395 
00396   // Create the experiment file list from a command line list.
00397   pcrecpp::RE extensionRE("(\\.chp(?:[:,]|$))",
00398                           pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00399 
00400   pcrecpp::StringPiece inputTest(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList);
00401   int numFiles = 0;
00402   std::string experimentFile;
00403 
00404   while (extensionRE.FindAndConsume(&inputTest, &experimentFile)) {
00405     numFiles++;
00406   }
00407 
00408   if ((numFiles == 0) || !(inputTest.empty())) {
00409     cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList << " invalid CHP experiment file name detected." << endl;
00410     validOptions  = false;
00411   } else if (numFiles == 1) {
00412     // Just one file.
00413     if (! Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList.c_str())) {
00414       cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList << " file not found.\n";
00415       validOptions = false;
00416     } else {
00417       rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.push_back(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList);
00418     }
00419   } else {
00420 
00421     pcrecpp::RE colonSeparatorRE("\\.chp:", pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00422     pcrecpp::RE commaSeparatorRE("\\.chp,",
00423                                  pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00424 
00425     bool isColonSeparated     = false;
00426     bool isCommaSeparated = false;
00427     std::string separator;
00428 
00429     if (colonSeparatorRE.PartialMatch(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList)) {
00430       isColonSeparated = true;
00431       separator = ':';
00432     }
00433     if (commaSeparatorRE.PartialMatch(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList)) {
00434       isCommaSeparated = true;
00435       separator = ",";
00436     }
00437 
00438     if (isColonSeparated && isCommaSeparated) {
00439       cerr << endl << "Invalid input file options: colon and comma separators cannot be mixed in the 'experiment-list'." << endl;
00440       validOptions = false;
00441     } else if (!isColonSeparated && !isCommaSeparated) {
00442       cerr << endl <<  "Invalid input file options: invalid 'experiment-list'." << endl;
00443       validOptions = false;
00444 
00445     } else if (validOptions) {
00446       pcrecpp::RE endFileRE("([^" + separator + "]+)");
00447 
00448       pcrecpp::StringPiece input(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList);
00449 
00450       while (endFileRE.FindAndConsume(&input, &experimentFile)) {
00451 
00452         if (! Fs::fileExists(experimentFile.c_str())) {
00453           validOptions = false;
00454           cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << experimentFile << " 'experiment-list' file not found."  << endl;
00455         }
00456         rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.push_back(experimentFile);
00457 
00458       }
00459       if (!input.empty()) {
00460         cerr << endl << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentList << " invalid CHP experiment file name detected. " << endl;
00461         validOptions = false;
00462       }
00463     }
00464 
00465   }
00466 
00467   return validOptions;
00468 
00469 }
00470 // end _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3
00471 /*****************************************************************************/
00472 /*****************************************************************************/
00473 /**
00474  * _validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3:
00475  * Synopsis:
00476  *
00477  * Helper function to _validateInputFilesDMET3, broken out for clarity.
00478  *
00479  * This routine reads a listing of files from a file, i.e. -E chp_files.txt.
00480  *
00481  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00482  * @param pgOopts - command line options object
00483  *
00484  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00485  */
00486 /*****************************************************************************/
00487 bool _validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine * engine)
00488 {
00489 
00490 
00491   bool validOptions = true;
00492   TsvFile tsv;
00493   set<std::string> duplicateCheck;
00494 
00495   if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile.c_str())) {
00496     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile << " file not found."  << endl;
00497     validOptions = false;
00498   } else {
00499     ExperimentFileTableModel eftm(rte, rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile);
00500 
00501     rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles = eftm.m_experimentFiles;
00502     validOptions = eftm.validateFiles();
00503   }
00504 
00505   return validOptions;
00506 
00507 }
00508 // end TranslationCommonControl::_validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3
00509 /*****************************************************************************/
00510 /*****************************************************************************/
00511 /**
00512  * TranslationCommonControl::_validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3:
00513  * Synopsis:
00514  *
00515  * See validateInputFiles, broken out for clarity.
00516  *
00517  * This routine reads a listing of files from a std::vector passed in by the
00518  * console.
00519  *
00520  *
00521  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00522  * @param pgOopts - command line options object
00523  *
00524  * @return - true if all input std::vector data was valid.
00525  */
00526 /*****************************************************************************/
00527 bool _validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine* engine)
00528 {
00529 
00530 
00531   bool validOptions = true;
00532   set<std::string> duplicateCheck;
00533 
00534   pcrecpp::RE extensionRE("\\.chp$",
00535                           pcrecpp::RE_Options().set_caseless(true));
00536   std::stringstream msgSStr;
00537 
00538   std::vector< std::string > experimentFiles = engine->getOptVector("experiment-list-vector");
00539 
00540   for (int i = 0; i < experimentFiles.size(); i++) {
00541 
00542     if (!extensionRE.PartialMatch(experimentFiles[i])) {
00543       msgSStr << experimentFiles[i] << ": invalid CHP file name." << endl;
00544       validOptions = false;
00545     } else if (!  Fs::fileExists(experimentFiles[i].c_str())) {
00546       msgSStr << experimentFiles[i] << ": file not found." << endl;
00547       validOptions = false;
00548     } else {
00549       if (duplicateCheck.count(experimentFiles[i]) > 0) {
00550         cerr << experimentFiles[i] << ": duplicate file found, ignoring.\n";
00551       } else {
00552         duplicateCheck.insert(experimentFiles[i]);
00553         rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.push_back(experimentFiles[i]);
00554       }
00555     }
00556   }
00557 
00558 
00559   if (! validOptions) {
00560     Verbose::out(ADT_VERBOSE_NORMAL, msgSStr.str());
00561   } else if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentFiles.size() == 0) {
00562     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputExperimentListFile << " no valid CHP files found." << endl;
00563     validOptions = false;
00564   }
00565 
00566   return validOptions;
00567 
00568 }
00569 // end _validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3
00570 /*****************************************************************************/
00571 /*****************************************************************************/
00572 /**
00573  * _validateInputFilesDMET3:
00574  * Synopsis:
00575  *
00576  * Helper function to  _validateInputFiles, broken out for clarity.
00577  *
00578  * ADDITIONAL NOTES: The list of files can be either a colon or
00579  * comma separated list. We check by looking for ".chp," or
00580  * ".chp:" in the list (when more than file exists).
00581  *
00582  *
00583  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00584  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00585  *
00586  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00587  */
00588 /*****************************************************************************/
00589 static bool _validateInputFilesDMET3(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine *engine)
00590 {
00591 
00592   bool validOptions = true;
00593 
00594 
00595   // HACK: change this once the DMET3 table is finalized
00596   if ((rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType == ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_DMET2) &&
00597       (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile.empty())) {
00598     cerr << "Invalid option: DMET2 translation file passed for DMET3 calling.\n";
00599     validOptions = false;
00600   }
00601 
00602   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile.empty()) {
00603     cerr << "Invalid option: annotation file is required (i.e. -a, --annotation-file option)" << endl;
00604     validOptions = false;
00605   } else if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile.c_str())) {
00606     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputAnnotationFile << " probe set annotation file not found." << endl;
00607     validOptions = false;
00608   }
00609 
00610   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile.empty()) {
00611     cerr << EXCEPTION_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE << endl;
00612     rte.m_invalidOptionsMask |= ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE;
00613     validOptions = false;
00614   } else if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType == ADT_TRANSLATION_TABLE_TYPE_INVALID) {
00615     validOptions = false;
00616     cerr << "Invalid option: " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << ": not a DMET3 tranlsation file."  << endl;
00617   } else {
00618     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile.c_str())) {
00619       validOptions = false;
00620       cerr << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile << ": input 'translate-file' file not found."  << endl;
00621     }
00622 
00623 
00624   }
00625 
00626   // Validate the CHP Genotype experiment files.
00627 
00628   // Add to the CHP experimet file list from a file.
00629   if (rte.m_adtOpts.m_audit.empty()) {
00630     if (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-file") != "") {
00631       validOptions = validOptions && _validateInputExperimentFilesFromFileDMET3(rte, engine);
00632     } else  if (engine->getOpt("experiment-list") != "") {
00633       validOptions = validOptions && _validateInputExperimentFilesFromListDMET3(rte, engine);
00634     } else if (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-vector") != "") {
00635       validOptions = validOptions && _validateInputExperimentFilesFromVectorDMET3(rte, engine);
00636     } else if (engine->getOpt("geno-dmet2-type-file") != "") {
00637       // Using Genotype short report style input.
00638       if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile.c_str())) {
00639         validOptions = false;
00640         cerr << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile << ": input genotype short report experiment file not found."  << endl;
00641       }
00642     } else  {
00643       cerr << EXCEPTION_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP_FILE << endl;
00644       rte.m_invalidOptionsMask |= ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP;
00645       validOptions = false;
00646     }
00647   }
00648 
00649   return validOptions;
00650 
00651 }
00652 // end _validateInputFilesDMET3
00653 /*****************************************************************************/
00654 /*****************************************************************************/
00655 /**
00656  * _validateInputFilesDMET2:
00657  * Synopsis:
00658  *
00659  * Helper function to _validateInputFilesDMET2, broken out for clarity.
00660  *
00661  *
00662  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00663  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00664  *
00665  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00666  */
00667 /*****************************************************************************/
00668 static bool _validateInputFilesDMET2(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine * engine)
00669 {
00670 
00671   bool validOptions = true;
00672 
00673   // INPUT DIRECTORY
00674   if (! Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str())) {
00675     validOptions = false;
00676     cerr << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir + "\" input directory not found.\n" ;
00677   } else if (! Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str())) {
00678     validOptions = false;
00679     cerr << "Invalid option: directory " << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir + "\" input directory read permission denied.\n" ;
00680   }
00681 
00682   pcrecpp::RE reCN("(?:(?:(?:^)|(?:[\\./]))\\d{8,8}_[\\d\\w]+_DMET[23]_cn_*)");
00683   pcrecpp::RE reGS("(?:(?:(?:^)|(?:[\\./]))\\d{8,8}_[\\d\\w]+_DMET[23]_Genotypes_Short_qc_*)");
00684   pcrecpp::RE reTT("((^)|([/]))DMET2_TTable_v\\d{8,8}_[^\\.]+\\.txt$");
00685   pcrecpp::RE reCurrentDirectory("\\.");
00686 
00687 
00688   std::list <std::string> searchFilesList
00689   = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::
00690     FileUtils::ListFiles(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir.c_str(), "txt");
00691 
00692   unsigned int numFoundFiles = 0;
00693   std::string *testFiles[] = { &(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputCopyFile),
00694                           &(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenoFile),
00695                           &(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile)
00696                         };
00697 
00698   const char * testOptionNames[] = { "copy-dmet2-number-file",
00699                                      "geno-dmet2-type-file",
00700                                      "translate-file",
00701                                    };
00702 
00703   pcrecpp::RE *testRegexes[] = { &reCN, &reGS, &reTT };
00704 
00705   std::list<std::string>::iterator sflIt1 = searchFilesList.begin();
00706 
00707   for (; sflIt1 != searchFilesList.end(); ++sflIt1) {
00708     for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00709       if (testFiles[i]->empty()   &&
00710           (testRegexes[i]->PartialMatch(*sflIt1))) {
00711         *(testFiles[i]) = *sflIt1 ;
00712         numFoundFiles++;
00713       }
00714     }
00715   }
00716 
00717   if ((numFoundFiles == 0) &&
00718       (engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[0]) == "") &&
00719       (engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[1]) == "") &&
00720       (engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[2]) == "") ) {
00721 
00722     if (engine->getOpt("input-dir") == "") {
00723       APT_ERR_ABORT("\nCurrent directory contains no input files.");
00724     }
00725     cerr << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir << "\" does not contain any experiment files or the required DMET3 input files." << endl;
00726     return false;
00727   }
00728 
00729   const char *testFileTypes[] = { "input copy number",
00730                                   "geno type short report",
00731                                   "translation file",
00732                                 };
00733   const std::string TRANSLATION_OPT_COPY_DMET2_FILE =                   \
00734       "(DMET2: 2 of 2 experiment files) => YYYYMMDD_*_DMET[23]_cn_*.txt";
00735   const std::string TRANSLATION_OPT_TRANSLATE_DMET2_FILE =      \
00736       "=> DMET2_TTTable_vYYYYMMDD_*.txt";
00737 
00738   const std::string * testFileNames[] = {
00739     &TRANSLATION_OPT_COPY_DMET2_FILE,
00740     &TRANSLATION_OPT_GENO_DMET2_FILE,
00741     &TRANSLATION_OPT_TRANSLATE_DMET2_FILE,
00742   };
00743 
00744   for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00745     if (testFiles[i]->empty()) {
00746       validOptions = false;
00747       if (reCurrentDirectory.FullMatch(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir)) {
00748         cerr << "Invalid option: current directory";
00749       } else {
00750         cerr << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputDir << "\"";
00751       }
00752       cerr << " is missing " << testFileTypes[i] << " file ";
00753       cerr << *testFileNames[i] << "." << endl;
00754     } else if (!  Fs::fileExists(testFiles[i]->c_str())) {
00755       validOptions = false;
00756       cerr << *testFiles[i] << ": input " << testFileTypes[i] << " file not found."  << endl;
00757     } else if ((engine->getOpt(testOptionNames[i]) == "") && !testRegexes[i]->PartialMatch(*testFiles[i])) {
00758       validOptions = false;
00759       cerr << "Invalid option: ";
00760       cerr << *testFiles[i] << ": invalid input " << testFileTypes[i];
00761       cerr << " file name, " ;
00762       cerr << "expecting " << *testFileNames[i] ;
00763       cerr << "." << endl;
00764     }
00765   }
00766 
00767   rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableType = TranslationTableModel::getTranslationTableFileType(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputTTableFile);
00768 
00769   return validOptions;
00770 
00771 }
00772 // end _validateInputFilesDMET2
00773 /*****************************************************************************/
00774 /*****************************************************************************/
00775 /**
00776  * _validateInputFiles:
00777  *
00778  * Synopsis: Helper to "validateOptions", broken out for clarity.
00779  * Validate user specified input files.
00780  *
00781  * This routine accomodates:
00782  * 1.) DMET2 files for DMET2 testing.
00783  * 2.) DMET3 files for DMET3 analysis
00784  * 3.) DMET2 files for DMET3 testing.
00785  * 4.) DMET2 files for DMET3 analysis*
00786  *
00787  * *The 4th case supports end users creating text files of data they
00788  * want analyzed. The text file format will be that of DMET2. Both
00789  * the Genotype Short Report and Copy Number Report files are required
00790  * for DMET2.
00791  *
00792  * The "-g" and "-c" options are exclusive to DMET2 input and it
00793  * is an error to use them in combination with "-e".
00794  *
00795  * The "-t" option for the translation table is required for both DMET2 and
00796  * DMET3, but the table formats are different and hence a DMET2 translation
00797  * table will need modified to perform DMET3 analysis. 
00798  *
00799  *
00800  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts. 
00801  * @params pgOopts - command line options object
00802  *
00803  * @return - true if all input files were valid.
00804  */
00805 /*****************************************************************************/
00806 static bool _validateInputFiles(RunTimeEnvironment & rte, TranslationEngine *engine)
00807 {
00808 
00809   APT_ERR_ASSERT(engine, "");
00810 
00811   bool validOptions = true;
00812 
00813 
00814   // Assume the default call behavior is for DMET3. If none of the
00815   // DMET2 or DMET3 input file options are passed the
00816   // give missing DMET3 input file message.
00817 
00818   bool isDMET3Call = (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling ||
00819                       (engine->getOpt("experiment-list") != "") ||
00820                       (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-file") != "") ||
00821                       (engine->getOpt("experiment-list-vector") != ""));
00822 
00823   bool isDMET2Call = (rte.m_adtOpts.m_dmet2Calling ||
00824                       (engine->getOpt("input-dir") != "") ||
00825                       (engine->getOpt("copy-dmet2-number-file") != ""));
00826 
00827 
00828   if (!isDMET3Call && !isDMET2Call) {
00829     cerr << "Invalid option: an experiment list of CHP files is required." << endl;
00830     validOptions = false;
00831   } else if (isDMET2Call && !isDMET3Call) {
00832     validOptions = _validateInputFilesDMET2(rte, engine);
00833     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_TSV;
00834   } else if (isDMET3Call && !isDMET2Call) {
00835     validOptions = _validateInputFilesDMET3(rte, engine);
00836   } else {
00837     cerr  << "Invalid option: use \"--dmet2-calling\" with DMET2 specific input files or the DMET2 input directory." << endl;
00838     validOptions = false;
00839   }
00840 
00841   if (engine->getOpt("geno-dmet2-type-file") != "") {
00842     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_TSV;
00843   } else {
00844     rte.m_adtOpts.m_streamType = ADT_EXPERIMENT_STREAM_TYPE_CHP;
00845   }
00846 
00847   // PROBE SET FILTER
00848 
00849   if (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.empty()) {
00850 
00851     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile.c_str())) {
00852       validOptions = false;
00853       cerr << "Invalid option: " <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputMarkerListFile << ": input marker list filter file not found."  << endl;
00854     }
00855   }
00856 
00857 
00858   // SAMPLE INFO FILE
00859   if (! rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile.empty()) {
00860     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile.c_str())) {
00861       validOptions = false;
00862       cerr << "Invalid option: " <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputSampleFile << ": input sample information file not found."  << endl;
00863     }
00864 
00865   }
00866 
00867   // GENOTYPE OVERRIDE FILE
00868   if (!rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile.empty()) {
00869     if (!  Fs::fileExists(rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile.c_str())) {
00870       validOptions = false;
00871       cerr << "Invalid option: " <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_inputGenotypeOverrideFile << ": input genotype override file not found."  << endl;
00872     }
00873   }
00874 
00875   return validOptions;
00876 
00877 }
00878 // end _validateInputFiles
00879 /*****************************************************************************/
00880 /*****************************************************************************/
00881 /**
00882  * TranslationCommonControl::validateCommonOptions
00883  * Synopsis:
00884  *
00885  * Validate options after they have been filled in by the call the
00886  * setCommonOptions. If any errors are detected during validation
00887  * then an exception is thrown via Err::Abort. 
00888  *
00889  * @param rte     - the single instance run time environment that houses the ADTOptions object as m_adtOpts previously set in setCommonOptions. . 
00890  * @param engine  - to be validated.
00891  *
00892  */
00893 /*****************************************************************************/
00894 void TranslationCommonControl::validateCommonOptions(RunTimeEnvironment & rte , TranslationEngine *engine)
00895 {
00896 
00897   APT_ERR_ASSERT(engine, "");
00898 
00899   bool validOptions = true;
00900 
00901   // INPUT FILES
00902   validOptions = _validateInputFiles(rte, engine);
00903 
00904   // OUTPUT DIRECTORY
00905   if (Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir.c_str())) {
00906 
00907     if (!Fs::isWriteableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir)) {
00908       validOptions = false;
00909       cerr  << "Invalid option: directory \"" << rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir << "\" output directory write permission denied." << endl;
00910     } else if (!Fs::isReadableDir(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir)) {
00911       validOptions = false;
00912       cerr << "Invalid option: directoy \"" <<  rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir << "\" output directory read permission denied." << endl;
00913     }
00914   } else {
00915 
00916     // Fs::mkdir Throws fatal exception.
00917     Fs::mkdirPath(rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir, false);
00918     Verbose::out(1, rte.m_adtOpts.m_outputDir + ": output directory created.\n");
00919   }
00920 
00921   if (! validOptions) {
00922 
00923     APT_ERR_ABORT(rte.m_adtOpts.m_progName + ": invalid options detected.");
00924 
00925   }
00926 
00927 }
00928 // end TranslationCommonControl::validateCommonOptions
